case.title: Is there a single women on this site that IS genuine -_- - 26 (London)
case.text:
Hi,
I am simply looking for any reply from a genuine lady, whether you may be young, mature, with kids, skinny or curvy, I just want to know if this site is not full of spammers and fake date internet hook ups.
Me? 26 year old, good looking mixed raced asian/middle eastern guy, laid back, easy going and a great sense of humor. If you interested, send a pic and lets get talking.
Just looking for a friendly connection and see where it could go...
Thanks
